DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and tolerability of ciclesonide nasal spray for long term use in relieving symptoms in perennial allergic rhinitis.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Tolerability of Ciclesonide Nasal Spray in Patients With Perennial Allergic Rhinitis (2-5 Years Old) (BY9010/M1-416)
DOC.criteria: Main General good health, other than perennial allergic rhinitis History and diagnosis of perennial allergic rhinitis by skin prick test History of perennial allergic rhinitis for a minimum of 90 days immediately before the screening visit Main Participation in any investigational drug trial within the 30 days before the screening visit Use of any disallowed concomitant medications within the prescribed withdrawal periods before the screening visit A known hypersensitivity to any corticosteroid
